Entries.companionAccepted: Sure, @!#$b#I'll show you how to have some fun around here!$h
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: Afraid you're gonna get bored without me huh?$7#$b#Of course I'll come with you.$h
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Of course, babe! I'm always ready for an adventure with you!$h
Entries.companionRejected: Sorry, Sean and I have plans to cook up something for Keahi and Trinnie.$7
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: Sorry babe, Mama's been asking me to fix up some of our 'special bait'.$s#$b#I'll make it up to you on our next date.<
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: Aww, sorry babe. But you're just gonna have to miss me right now.#$b#I promised Trinnie I'd teach her how to cartwheel.#$b#I'll make it up to you when we get back home okay?$l
Entries.companionRejectedNight: Uh, isn't it too late?#$b#Mama would be suspicious if I stroll around this late with an acquaintance.
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: Aww, babe. It's late and I'm tired.$s#$b#Can we reschedule the stroll another time?
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Aww, babe. It's late already.$s#$b#Can't we just stay in bed, cuddle, and... play games?$7
Entries.companionDismiss: Wow, that was some adventure!$h#$b#We've got to bring Sean and the kids next time!$h#$b#We'll play games and look for treasure with them! Haha!
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: Thank you for taking me on your stroll, babe.#$b#I really had fun!$h
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: It still feels like the first time we took a stroll together.$l#$b#I really had fun going on an adventure with you babe.$h#$b#Till our next adventure?$l
Entries.companionDismissAuto: Hey, it's late already. Mama will be loca if I get home too late.$u
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: Babe, I'll go ahead alright?#$b#I've got an early morning tomorrow.#$b#See you tomorrow, babe! Muah! <
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Babe, I'll head on home alright?#$b#I'll prep the bed and start up the fire for us. Teehee.$l#$b#Then we'll cuddle and play around.$h
Entries.companionRecruited: So, where are we going?#$b#Did you wanna go to the falls?#$b#Or the Ridge?#$b#Oh, oh! Or maybe the beach!$h
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: Now, now, where are you taking your wonderful wife?$7#$b#Haha, I'm excited to stroll with you, babe! I miss you.$l
Entries.farmerRunAway: Hold up! Jeez you're fast! We could use you playing tag!$h
Entries.giveForages: Keahi says these are good. Here, have some!
Entries.farmerRunAway_Dating: Jeez babe, slow down. What are you running away from?$u
Entries.farmerRunAway_Spouse: Babe! No fair. Don't leave me here alone.$s
Entries.companion_Farm: Wow, that's quite the farm you got there, @.
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Have you ever thought about putting some yard games on your farm?#$b#You've got so much space it'll be fun to play around here!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Ah, rain. Crops' source of food for growth.#$b#We just have to keep our heads dry, mama says they make our head frizz.$u
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: Brr, it's cold. Why don't we make snow people in front of your house?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: The crops are really blooming during this time of year, huh?#$b#You're really doing a good job on your farm, @!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: Sheesh, it gets really hot out here.$u#$b#But man, your crops look good.#$b#What do you do to keep them healthy during summer?
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: Remember to rake in those fallen leaves.#$b#If you'd like, I could help you during my free time!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: It's crazy how the winter season covers up everything.#$b#Oh well, it gives you enough time to plan out your landscape for spring!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: Nice babe, looks like you really did a lot of hard work on your farm!
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: You're farm looks so good babe.$h#$b#If you need my help with anything just let me know okay?
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: Yikes, this rain isn't good for our hair babe.$u#$b#I'm scared you'll see me frizz out.$s#$b#Whatever! Let's play tag, babe! It's fun to play under the rain!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: Babe, let's go make snow angels!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Dating: I like how the crops bloom around your farm, babe!$h#$b#Just like how I bloom whenever I'm with you...$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Dating: Babe, come here let me wipe of your sweat.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: What if we make a pile with those leaves and jump in them together?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: I sometimes find the blank space of winter pretty.#$b#Hmm, what if we make crazy messages in the snow?$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: Our farm has grown a lot, babe.#$b#You did a good job nurturing it from the start.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Hmm, maybe we should build swings and the like so that Trinnie and Keahi could come here and play?#$b#Maybe even our future kids someday.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: It really is fun strolling under the rain with you.$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Let's make a snow-family babe!#$b#That'll be a cute way to welcome our guests into  the farm.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: The crops are thriiving, babe! The farm looks so pretty!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: Jeez this heat really makes me want to take some layers off.$u#$b#Haha, on a more serious note though. The farm looks spectacular. We have to make sure we water them just right.
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: Maybe we could use the leaves as part of our costumes for Spirit's eve, don't you think so babe?
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: One good thing about winter is that we get to spend more time together than focusing on the crops in our farm.$h#$b#Don't get me wrong though, I also like working on the farm with you, babe.$l
Entries.companion_Town: If you like we could check out the playground. Last time I went here Sean buried some 'treasure' maybe we could look for it together.$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: The village has always been a safe space for me, ever since papa left.$s#$b#I still miss him very much.$s
It's crazy how this village was once inhabited by magical creatures, or so the storybooks says.
Entries.companionSuggest: Hey! Can I hang out with you today?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Hey! Let's go on a date today? Come on! Please?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: Hey, babe! Let's go on a date today? Come on! Pretty please?#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Nice! Thanks, @. I swear I'll show you a good time!
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Dating: Yay, you really can't stand being away from me too, huh babe?$h
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Spouse: Yay! Another adventure with you!$h#$b#We'll imagine going to far off lands and fighting dragons around!$h
Entries.companionSuggest_No_Spouse: Aw, okay. I'll go with Sean and the kids then.
